reviews.review_msg: This course contains a group project assignment (debate) and the grading for this group project was so bizarre. Do not take any courses with this professor if you do not want your GPA to suffer. Her criteria is not clear at all.

She is blunt, rude, and nit picky. CRIM 318 (Wildlife Crime) should be considered a W course. This course is paper based so even if you know the material well, if you are not a good writer she will not be forgiving. The feedback is not helpful at all. The criteria is vague. She is extremely anal with referencing and word count. Awful experience.

She takes time to outline paper guidelines and expectations. She  marks the first paper gives helpful feedback. From there the TA marks the second and third paper, which is where people felt feedback was inconsistent (not her fault).She is chill and very accommodating to the stresses of being a student. 45% of grade is known 1/2 way through term
She grades super harsh and the feedback she provides is completely different every time. She won't give you a clear idea of what she wants and contradicts her guidelines.
